room_title: Escape room "Theft of the Texas Lone Star" by Escape Hunt in Houston
review: We had so much fun! The employees were engaging and helpful. The innovative and intriguing puzzles made the hour fly by. I can't wait to try another escape!

room_title: Escape room "Theft of the Texas Lone Star" by Escape Hunt in Houston
review: Highly recommended. Need to have your thinking cap on!

room_title: Escape room "Theft of the Texas Lone Star" by Escape Hunt in Houston
review: Had a great time in the Theft of the Lone Star room. It was moderate difficulty and suited our party of five well. Our game master was great - very detailed, very funny and patient with us. We will definitely be coming back soon.

room_title: Escape room "Theft of the Texas Lone Star" by Escape Hunt in Houston
review: Came here with my wife, kids and in laws. We did the Lone Star room and had a blast! It was challenging and full of surprises. Highly recommend for a fun night out.

room_title: Escape room "Theft of the Texas Lone Star" by Escape Hunt in Houston
review: I booked this event for my office and let me tell you...We had a great time! I'd done an escape room before at Escape Now and this was wayyy better! The Theft at Lonestar was fun and challenging, but not so hard to the point it's not enjoyable. Had a blast!
